name: pfalcon's F-Droid Staging
short_description:
F-Droid.org is a repository of OpenSource software for Android OS. In layman terms, it is "market" or "appstore", except that it explicitly draws from decades of experience of package management for Unix/Linux distributions.

This specific project is a particular developer's staging area - new packages go here for testing and review before they are submitted to F-Droid upstream.

Please note that the quality of packages here may be lower than in F-Droid mainline, so use this repository at your own risk (which is always the case with OpenSource software).

To use this repository, add following repository source in F-Droid client:

http://master.dl.sourceforge.net/project/fdroid-staging/repo

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Advanced End Users
Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Developers
Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Testers

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android
